SELECT concat(date_format(now(), "%y%m%d"), LPAD(ifnull(max(substr(user_num, 7)), "0") + 1, 4, 0))

insert into user values (#{userNum}, #{userName}, #{birthDate}, #{address}, #{phoneNum}, #{userId}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{itdcCont}, #{supplWhet}, #{blonSggName}, #{picPath}, #{rrnRear}, #{avgRate}, #{ownMileage})

choose.when: SELECT user_num AS userNum, user_name As UserName, birth_date AS birthDate, address, phone_num AS phoneNum, id AS userId, email, itdc_cont AS itdcCont, suppl_whet AS supplwhet, blon_sgg_name AS blonSggName, pic_path AS picPath, rrn_rear AS rrnRear, avg_rate AS avgRate, own_mileage AS ownMileage FROM user WHERE blon_sgg_name = #{blonSggName} ORDER BY avg_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
choose.otherwise: SELECT user_num AS userNum, user_name As UserName, birth_date AS birthDate, address, phone_num AS phoneNum, id AS userId, email, itdc_cont AS itdcCont, suppl_whet AS supplwhet, blon_sgg_name AS blonSggName, pic_path AS picPath, rrn_rear AS rrnRear, avg_rate AS avgRate, own_mileage AS ownMileage FROM user ORDER BY avg_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
